pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Datadog Checks Dev[![Latest PyPI version][1]][3][![Supported Python versions][2]][3]-----This is the developer toolkit designed for use by any [Agent-based][5] check orintegration repository.## InstallationSee [this guide][6].## DocumentationDocs are available [here][7].[1]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/datadog-checks-dev.svg[2]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/datadog-checks-dev.svg[3]: https://pypi.org/project/datadog-checks-dev/[5]: https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-agent[6]: https://datadoghq.dev/integrations-core/setup/#ddev[7]: https://datadoghq.dev/integrations-core/ddev/about/
